𒈝 ≈ 𒋙𒇹 ≈ 𒋙𒇹𒐏 ≈ 𒋞 ☑

𒋞 GAR₈ 𓉕 gàrradh קִיר kir кереге kerege 𒂍𒋞 veggur சுவர் cuvar "wall" > سور sūr ⇔ 𓉧 𓉔 ⇔ guard
𒋞 gar8 course karaa carretera sore شَارِع šāriʿ सड़क saṛak ڕێگە srêge ರಸ್ತೆ raste road
𒋞 gar8 callis calle calla 𑀕𑀮𑀻 galī गली galī 길 gil சாலை cālai κέλευθος kéleuthos kelias ceļš жол <?> gait, gate
𒋞 gar₈ ⇔ guard ⇔ ግድግዳ gədgəda კედელი ḳedeli "wall" 𓊆 𓏤 ⇔ 𓊋 𒌷 ⇔ 𓉨 𓉧 𓊅 𒂦 𒁁 baut path 𓈐
𒋞 gar₈ 𓐍 𓂋 قَرِيب qarīb קָרוֹב karóv 𒋞𒅂 "near"

𒋞 ≈ 𒊩… late form

𒋞 SIG4 सड़क saṛak شَارِع šāriʿ street Strecke track ⇔ circ 𓊖
𒋞 SIG4 šeg₁₂ Ziegel "mudbrick" (libittu) 𒊺 𒅁 adobe

𒋟 se₁₁ 𒅆 se₂₈ ⇔ lake sea look see

𒋟 = 𒋞𒋞𒋙 lahhušu Akk. šupat karpati "base of a pot" ⇔ potamus Fluss?

𓈘 𓈐 rod / road
𒈱𒋞 mall / mārga
𒈝 MA.EGIR5 길 gil ڕێگە rêge орук oruk < سڑک saṛak street

𓌻 𓂋 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓏤 | riverbank | •māróad 𒈝 water-road #mālaku 𓅓 𓍿 𓃒 𒄯𒊏 mur-raᵈ
𓌻 𓂋 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓏤 | riverbank | •māróad 𒈱𒋞 MURGU मार्ग mārga 𓅓 𓂝 𓍿 𓇱 road

𒈱𒋞 MURGU 𓈘 𓈐 Afroasiatic *m-r “river, channel” = river
𒈱𒋞 MURGU ma.rück(en) : back, backbone, shoulder
𒈱𒋞 MURGU MA.EGIR 𒈱 ⇔ Ecken?
𒈱𒋞 MURGU ⇔ मार्ग mārga (road) mall 马路 mǎlù ⇔
𒈝 LUM lù.ma 路 •line •lane ⇔ 𒈱𒋞 road

𒋞 ⋍ 𒅤𒌈 (/butum, budum/, “shoulders, region between the two” beide
(between both bodies of water)
